name: ai-ml-engineering-pack
description: Professional AI/ML engineering toolkit with 12 plugins: Prompt optimization, LLM integration, RAG systems, vector databases, AI safety guardrails
features: Prompt Engineering: Optimization, A/B testing, cost reduction (30-50%)
LLM Integration: Multi-provider setup, model evaluation, monitoring
RAG Systems: Design, vector DB setup (Pinecone, Weaviate), embeddings
AI Safety: Guardrails, fine-tuning prep, documentation generation
Production-ready patterns for building AI products
